title: Key Combinations / Hot key passthrough exceptions.
author: danagin
body_snippet:
<!-- Feature Request -->
It would be nice to have exceptions for passing key combinations/hotkeys. I use the virtual desktop feature in Windows 10, and many use this or other multi desktop tools. I would like to be able to keep Win+Control+Arrow on the host desktop, and pass all other hotkeys to the remote client. 

Mine is just one use case scenario for this feature, I'm sure there are many others. This would allow me to have mRemoteNG full screen on one of my virtual desktops, then my other...
